long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your browsing experience on X/Twitter with "Post Filter for X," a browser extension designed specifically for science and research enthusiasts. This extension helps you focus on content that matters by fading out less relevant posts, ads, and noise.

Key Features
- Fade out posts that do not contain relevant links/domains/usernames/keywords, ensuring you see more content-rich posts.
- Science-first: Prioritize scientific dialogue by selectively fading posts without links to recognized research or science-related domains.
- Customizable intensity: Control the opacity levels of posts that are faded out, giving you complete control over your browsing experience.
- Customizable whitelist: Add own domains/URLs/usernames/accounts/keywords that are the most personally relevant.
- Ad-blocking: Improve your feed by dimming advertisements, allowing you to concentrate on useful content.

Whether you're a researcher, academic, or simply a science enthusiast, Post Filter for X helps you cut through the clutter on Twitter. Our extension is built to support your quest for knowledge by highlighting posts that are grounded in verifiable sources and scientific discussions.

Experience a cleaner, more relevant browsing experience with Post Filter for X. Because when it comes to science, every link counts!
